program main
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i, j, count, ans1, ans2, ans3, n_third
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: P, nglist
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: pos
    integer :: temp

    ! Read input for first program
    read*, N
    allocate(P(N))
    allocate(pos(0:N-1))
    allocate(nglist(N))  ! Maximum possible elements is N-1, so N is safe

    count = 0

    do i = 1, N
        read*, P(i)
        P(i) = P(i) - 1  ! Convert to 0-based
    end do

    ! Initialize pos array
    pos = -1  ! Initialize all to -1
    do j = 1, N
        pos(P(j)) = j - 1  ! Java's index is j-1 (0-based)
    end do

    ! Build nglist
    count = 0
    do i = 0, N-2
        if (pos(i) > pos(i+1)) then
            count = count + 1
            nglist(count) = i
        end if
    end do

    ! Compute ans1
    if (count == 0) then
        ans1 = 0
    else
        ans1 = min( (N - nglist(1) - 1), (nglist(count) + 1) )
        do i = 1, count - 1
            temp = nglist(i) + 1 + (N - nglist(i+1) - 1)
            if (temp < ans1) then
                ans1 = temp
            end if
        end do
    end if

    ! Second program's step

    ans3 = 0
    do i = 1, n_third
        integer :: k
        k = n_third / i
        ans3 = ans3 + i * k * (k + 1) / 2
    end do

    print*, ans3

    deallocate(P, pos, nglist)
end program main
